unnormalised: Borem, mhaka tumi "bandwidth" mhajea aajecheak sangtalem dusrea disa. Tum zannam, khuim tech-savvy asunk yevjach mhunn dakhoitelm. Tine vicharlem ti even kitem mantalem. Mhanv suru kelem "hem pipechea akarachem" asaa, tum zannam, zon vhodd pipe, zaitim data pravahit zaupacheak zai. Magir mhanv thoda jargon "Mbps" (megabits per second) sodle ani tene mhaka martian bhaxen uloune suru kelem. Uktaunk, Mbps mhanun kitlench Bollywood movi tumhi ekach velar download korunk xaktat kiteak tumchi internet ek gogalgaiche porim naagin nach kortat.
normalised: Okay, mhunnlle mhaka "bandwidth" mhaje aajiyeak somzaitallon te dusre diis. Tuka khobor asa, pure tech-savvy zata mhunn dakhoupak zatallon. Tannem vicharlem ki tachem orth kitem mhunn. Hanvem "tem ek paipa sarke" asat mhunn suruvaat keli, tuka khobor asa, jevda paipa vhodd, tevdho dhata bhitorlean vochunk shakya. Magir hanvem thode jargon vapurle jevda "M-B-P-S" (megabits per second) ani tanni fakt mhaka martian bhaxa uloitana poli. M-B-P-S mhunnlle mhunnlle thode Bollywood movies tumi ekach pavtt downlodd karunk shaktta tumchem internet ek zonke nashtik dhaanvta poilim.

unnormalised: Tine tenam mhaka classic uchcharta: "Tor, beta, mhajem Facebook bandwidht ghevn asa?" LOL! Uktaunk tine buffering kartana YT-acher serials pollounk ani mhajea mamaak PUBG divas bhortanam khellpak bolaytolem. Mhanv tica sangtolem gharaan ekmekancho ladu ekdom khatunk zata – konnak tori thodde zai, ani connection tornn zata. Mhaka dista tine zann asa teva mhanv kitlim lok Mumbai local rush velar shirunk provas kortat.
normalised: Tanni magir mhaka classic praashna marlo: "So, beta, mhaje Facebook pura bandwidth vaprat?" L-O-L! Tannem apli serial Y-T poitatana buffering kela, ani hachi pura zagaire mhaje uncle-n pura diis P-U-B-G kheltta mhunn dilem. Hanvem tanka sangla ki tem pura gharache lok ek shelle samosa karitanam sarke asa – sab tanka ek tukda zai, ani connection patall zata. Mhaka lagta ki tanni tem sokla ghetlem jem hanvem tem Mumbai local-ant rush hour-ant ghuspaak karitanam kitlo lok asat te somzaitaalem.

unnormalised: Magir tine vicharlem "cookies" vishe. Nahi Parle-G prakaranchem! Mhanv shapath kartam, internet cookies bandwidth magir IIT entrance examachea tayarekortat. Mhanv sangtalam te tichem data nakhatat, punn punarpuranikartanaka tichem preference yad kartat. Tichi chai sadha 2 chamche sakreche sangtalem porim. Ti shanka aslem – "Tor, internet zannam mhaka zaitich sakar zai? Chee chee!"
normalised: Magir tanni "cookies" vixayan vicharlem. Parle-G sarke nhoi, tuka gomta! Mhaka shapath, internet cookies bandwidth-a bhitorlean sangita poilim mhaka IIT entrance examak zaite ghoda zaate sarke zata. Hanvem tanka sanglle ki tim fakt achem data khaiti nhoi, pura favtea tuje preference yaad dhavrat. Yaad karpa sarke ti hamesha dona chamache sakkhar asailli chai ordar korta. Ti asvastaa asteli – "So, internet taka khobor asa ki mhaka zait sakkhar zai mhunn? Chee chee!"

unnormalised: Ani "the cloud" vishe mhaka suru korunakai. Te sangunk provas kartanam, tine vastavik pausachem dhag amche foto ani kagdat sangrohunkelea bagechea kallpita. Tine sanglim tika te vaastavik kabaat surakshit dovratanaka borem lagtam, thank you very much! Tica zannak zai "the cloud"k havaamaanchem bagechea forecasht. Mhanv majha chaiak lagli.
normalised: Ani mhaka "the cloud" vixayan suruvaat korunk sodhnaaka. Jem hanvem tanka tem somzaupaak prayatna kela, tannem fakt vaatavranache dhugaam amchen fotos ani documenta samballta mhunn kalpo. Tannem sangla ki ti apli kimti chiz apla cupboard-an samballpak dhakteli, dhanyavaad! Tanki vaatavranache "the cloud"-a khatir vaatavranacho nidaan zaai? Hanvem mhaje chaye-cho ghonto dakhlo.

unnormalised: Gambat, internet sangunk ekdakonnaka janni "www" ek gupt kode mantat to ek anubhav. Punn hey, tika khobor asa tika tichi internet ghargosnni tichem Wifi chorunk nakat (punn, te korunk xaktat!). Tumcho vell "offline" jauchea asa, mhajha brainak ek hard reset zai.
normalised: Seriously, internetache shabda tanka somzaupaak jem tanka "W-W-W" mhunnlle thode secret code asa mhunn lagta ek anubhav. Punn hey, kam se kam tanka aata khobor asa ki tanchi dhim internet fakt tanche ajukache lok WiFi chorita nhoi (punn, shayad choritat!). Mhaka ataka "offline" vochunk favo, mhaje mentalak ek hard reset zai.
